content: ***double_crochet dice bag and rolling tray crochet pattern*** pattern is available for free on my blog or download the ad-free version here for a small fee **free crochet pattern published on my blog ** https //greenfoxfarmsdesigns com/double_crochet-dice-bag-free * awesome dice bag is easy and fun to make * carry your dice in style in this small or medium dice bag * bonus --> the dice bag does double duty as a rolling tray * makes a great gift for the board gamer or role player in your life * playing with dice on the go is now a cinch * simple drawstring closure is easy to open and close * just open the tray all the way up and the natural sides allow you to roll the dice without chasing them * small size is great for board games * medium size is great for dice games and role play games *learn to create a magic_ring with double_crochet video tutorial * click here to join my facebook community for exclusive discounts cals giveaways and more --> join the fb group 1 **materials ** worsted weight yarn 120 yds i recommend red heart super saver g 4 0 mm hook yarn needle scissors **stitch key ** st s stitch es space space s slip_stitch slip_stitch chain chain single_crochet - single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet incr incr by 2 double_crochet in same st yo yarn over fo fasten_off **green fox farms designs original crochet pattern ** i am here to help if you have any questions feel free to send me a message through my blog or social media fb & ig links below this pattern is **free** but has not been tested by anyone besides myself please feel free to share any questions or comments you may have i welcome your feedback this pattern is my intellectual property you are welcome to make as many as you like sell them give them away etc you may not sell or alter and claim as your own this pattern this pattern may not be mass produced it is for individual use only you may not use my photographs if you want to share this pattern online you must only share a link to my blog you may not copy and paste my text / the pattern to another site thank you for respecting my work thank you lisa fox **my website and blog with other free patterns ** www greenfoxfarmsdesigns com/ find me on etsy https //www etsy com/shop/greenfoxfarms follow me i share updates photos and occasional giveaways and sales on my social media pages come join the fun https //www instagram com/greenfoxfarms/ https //www facebook com/greenfoxfarms/ 1 http //bit ly/gffdesignsgroup
